paper.title: Fault-tolerant and Transactional Stateful Serverless Workflows
paper.authors: Haoran Zhang, Adney Cardoza, Peter Baile Chen, Sebastian Angel, Vincent Liu

projects.head: JUpyter Notebook with Enhanced Access and Understanding (JUNEAU)
desc: JUNEAU is a system of holistic data management tools which can find, standardize, and benefit from the existing resources in the data lake
Initiated the use of Locality-sensitive hashing Ensemble (LSHE) for similarity comparisons among categorical data and two-sample KS tests among numerical data
Introduced similarity search among hierarchical data, achieved through converting hierarchical data to relational views, followed by the usage of multi-way top-k query and schema mapping
